product_name: Nike Zoom Vomero+ 8 Trail-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: The Nike Zoom Vomero+ 8 Trail-Running Shoes are lighter weight than their predecessor while still offering plush comfort, stability and cushioning for excellent performance on your trail runs. Open-mesh uppers allow excellent airflow to keep your feet cool and dry. Dynamic Fit technology wraps your midfeet and arches from underneath for a glovelike fit and unparalleled comfort. Include full-length Cushlon midsoles for soft yet responsive cushioning and durability. Heel and forefoot Nike Zoom Air units for lightweight, responsive cushioning at heel-strike and toe-off. Soft heel crash pads for impact protection. Deep flex grooves and secondary flex grooves within the Waffle outsole segments improve flexibility, durability and a smooth transition. Waterproof and virtually unbreakable, a Nike+ sensor fits perfectly into the pocket under the left insole (sensor not included). Nike+ sensor works with your iPod nano, iPod touch 2G or later or iPhone 3GS or later to track distance, time, pace and calories burned, relaying the info to you via the phone.
short_description: The Nike Zoom Vomero+ 8 Trail-Running Shoes are lighter weight than their predecessor while still offering plush comfort, stability and cushioning for excellent performance on your trail runs.
